attributes.action: Look very hard at this charitys actions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its disgusting that a charity that is supposed to look after its own people is even thinking about clousure,and kicking people out on the streets.There is far too much of this already going on in the country.Care should be as intended cradle to the grave.Please do asomething positive for once in your life and question the motives behind this obscene move by this charity.D Townsend.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting the government actually do.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
